events.name: Claude Opus 4
events.detail: 200 K context + tool APIs positions Anthropic at frontier; raises safety bar.

events.name: DeepSeek R1
events.detail: Commodity-priced frontier reasoning ($1/MTok) collapses cost barrier to advanced AI.

events.name: OpenAI o3
events.detail: Outperforms GPT-4 on complex reasoning by scaling 'thought' steps; new best-in-class.

events.name: OpenAI o1
events.detail: 'Reasoning-first' LM allocates adaptive compute per query; step beyond static inference.

events.name: GPT-4o ('omni')
events.detail: Real-time audio-vision-text with sub-second latency—closest to fluid, agentic multimodal intelligence so far.

events.name: DeepSeek-V2
events.detail: First open dense model aimed explicitly at multi-tool reasoning; rivalled proprietary peers.

events.name: Llama 3
events.detail: 70 B open model reaches GPT-4-class benchmarks—democratized frontier performance.

events.name: OpenAI Sora
events.detail: Minute-long photorealistic text-to-video → toward world-model alignment with reality.

events.name: Gemini 1.5 Pro (1 M context)
events.detail: Shows transformers can reason over book-length input—critical for long-horizon AGI tasks.

events.name: Mixtral 8×7B
events.detail: Sparse MoE open model matches GPT-3.5 quality at 1/10th compute—efficient scaling validated.

events.name: Llama 2 open weights
events.detail: 70 B permissive license brings frontier-level LLMs to everyone—open-source arms race begins.

events.name: GPT-4
events.detail: Multimodal model reaches professional benchmarks; stronger reasoning & safety layers.

events.name: ChatGPT launch
events.detail: RLHF chat UX puts LLMs into mainstream workflows—100 M users in months.

events.name: Stable Diffusion open-source
events.detail: High-quality text-to-image released under permissive license—mass democratization of generative AI.

events.name: AlphaFold 2
events.detail: Near-experimental protein folding accuracy demonstrates AI solving grand scientific tasks.

events.name: GPT-3 (175 B)
events.detail: Emergent few-shot capabilities confirm scaling laws as a route toward generality.

events.name: GPT-2 full release
events.detail: Large LM shows coherent multi-paragraph generation & policy debate on misuse.

events.name: BERT
events.detail: Mask-language pretraining unlocks transferable language understanding; SOTA across NLP.

events.name: AlphaZero self-play
events.detail: General algorithm masters multiple board games without human data—evidence of model-based general reasoning.

events.name: Transformer architecture
events.detail: Attention enables parallel training & unlimited context scaling—core of all modern LLMs.

events.name: AlphaGo defeats Lee Sedol
events.detail: Policy/value nets + MCTS crack Go—a milestone once thought decades away.

events.name: OpenAI founded
events.detail: Non-profit created with explicit AGI-safety charter—catalyst for frontier-model race.

events.name: DeepMind DQN (Atari)
events.detail: Pixel-to-action RL surpasses humans on 49 games—general sensorimotor learning demo.

events.name: GANs introduced
events.detail: Adversarial training achieves photoreal synthesis—key generative concept.

events.name: word2vec embeddings
events.detail: Continuous vector semantics make language computable geometry, foundational for LLMs.

events.name: AlexNet wins ImageNet
events.detail: GPU-trained deep CNN crushes error rate—data+compute+depth formula validated.

events.name: ImageNet dataset
events.detail: Gigantic labeled corpus enables data-hungry models & objective benchmarking.

events.name: CUDA 1.0
events.detail: Turns consumer GPUs into parallel compute engines; ML training speeds jump x100.

events.name: Deep Belief Networks
events.detail: Unsupervised pretraining reveals deep hierarchical features—deep-learning renaissance ignites.

events.name: DARPA Grand Challenge success
events.detail: First fully autonomous vehicle completes desert course—proof of large-scale sensor fusion & RL.

events.name: Deep Blue vs Kasparov
events.detail: Superhuman search + heuristics conquers grandmaster chess—narrow AI outperforms experts.

events.name: LeCun CNN (ZIP codes)
events.detail: Convolutional nets beat handcrafted vision; template for end-to-end perception.

events.name: Backpropagation revival
events.detail: Efficient gradient training for multi-layer nets; prerequisite for deep learning.

events.name: Intel 4004 microprocessor
events.detail: Single-chip CPU gives personal access to computation—decentralizes AI experimentation.

events.name: Shakey mobile robot
events.detail: Integrates perception, planning, and actuation—first autonomous reasoning in physical space.

events.name: ELIZA chatbot
events.detail: Simple pattern matching fools users → reveals human tendency to anthropomorphize machines.

events.name: Unimate robot arm
events.detail: First industrial robot; moves AI from screen to world, previewing embodied AGI.

events.name: MOSFET
events.detail: Transistor scalable to billions; enables CPUs & GPUs that train today's LLMs.

events.name: Integrated circuit
events.detail: Multiple transistors on one chip → exponential scaling economy that powers deep nets.

events.name: Rosenblatt Perceptron
events.detail: Hardware that learns weights—prototype for connectionist approaches.

events.name: Dartmouth workshop
events.detail: 'Artificial Intelligence' named; explicit goal of human-level thinking machines set.

events.name: Shannon information theory
events.detail: Quantifies information & noise—bedrock for coding, compression, ML loss functions.

events.name: Transistor invented
events.detail: Orders-of-magnitude shrink in compute cost; Moore's law path begins.

events.name: von Neumann architecture
events.detail: Stored-program concept → software-defined cognition; every modern AI system inherits it.

events.name: Colossus computer
events.detail: Programmable electronics prove high-speed symbolic reasoning at national-security scale.

events.name: McCulloch–Pitts neuron
events.detail: First formal neuron model; sparks idea of learning machines mirroring biology.

events.name: Ada Lovelace notes
events.detail: Recognizes machines can manipulate symbols beyond arithmetic—philosophical root of AI.

events.name: Analytical Engine design
events.detail: General-purpose, stored-program computer conceived a century early—AGI conceptually imaginable.

events.name: Turing's Universal Machine
events.detail: Shows single device can emulate any algorithm—mathematical groundwork for general intelligence.

events.name: Triode vacuum tube
events.detail: Electronic amplification enables digital switching—foundation for electronic brains.

events.name: Hollerith tabulator
events.detail: Automated census proves data processing can eclipse human clerks; information work mechanized.

events.name: Jacquard loom
events.detail: Punch-card control → hardware/software split; earliest programmable device.

events.name: Watt's separate-condenser engine
events.detail: Efficiency leap scales mechanization; society sees non-human labor as normal.

events.name: Newcomen steam engine
events.detail: First practical machine replacing muscle with autonomous power—birth of automation.
